roleset.name: at a lower level, not immediatly underneath

example.name: both args
example.text: This is subjacent to 27 feet of blue, finely laminated limestone, with white streaks, upon which rests a red bed ot calcareous conglomerate 2 feet thick;
example.arg: to 27 feet of blue, finely laminated limestone, with white streaks, upon which rests a red bed ot calcareous conglomerate 2 feet thick;

roleset.note: SUBJACENT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from subjacent.01-j)
